data.event: The City of Miramar was incorporated on May 26, 1955.

event.title: June 20th, 1955, the city's first mayor and city council were sworn

data.event: On June 20th, 1955, the city's first mayor and city council were sworn in, all of which were appointed by the governor and served until January 1959 at which time the first municipal election was held.

On June 20th, 1955, the city's first mayor and city council were sworn in, all of which were appointed by the governor and served until January 1959 at which time the first municipal election was held.
